column2: RECODED DRUG USE
Len : 1    RC-ANY TOBACCO PRODUCTS OR NICOTINE VAPING - EVER USED
Len : 1    RC-ANY TOBACCO PRODUCTS OR NICOTINE VAPING - PAST YEAR USE
0 = Did not use in the past year (All source variables = 0) ..................................................
Len : 1    RC-ANY TOBACCO PRODUCTS OR NICOTINE VAPING - PAST MONTH USE
0 = Did not use in the past month (All source variables = 0) ..............................................
1 = Used within the past month (Any source variable = 1) .................................................
OTE: Beginning in 2022, recoded variables TOBVAPONL2 and TOBCIGVAP2 replace variables TOBVAPONL and TOBCIGVAP. The new

column1: <s>versions of the variables were created using the new nicotine vaping variables.</s>

column2: Len : 1    RC-NIC VAPING / TOBACCO PRODUCTS ONLY - PAST MONTH USE
1 = Vaped nic but no use of tob prod  (NICVAPMON=1 and TOBMON=0) .....................
2 = Vaped nicotine and used tob prod (NICVAPMON=1 and TOBMON=1) .....................
3 = Used tob prod but did not vape nic(NICVAPMON=0 and TOBMON=1) ....................
4 = Did not use tob prod or vape nic (NICVAPMON=0 and TOBMON=0) .......................
Len : 1    RC-NIC VAPING AND CIG/NONCIG TOBACCO COMBINATIONS-PM USE
1 = Vaped nic & used cigs as only tob: NICVAPMON=1 & TOBCIGONL=1 ..................
2 = Vaped nic, used cigs, & other tob: NICVAPMON=1 & TOBCIGONL=2 ...................
3 = Vaped nic & used tob but not cigs: NICVAPMON=1 & TOBCIGONL=3 ..................
4 = Did not both vape nic & use tob: NICVAPMON=0 or TOBCIGONL=4 .....................
Len : 1    RC-ALCOHOL - EVER USED
Len : 1    RC-ALCOHOL - PAST YEAR USE
Len : 1    RC-ALCOHOL - PAST MONTH USE
Len : 1    RC-CBD OR HEMP - EVER USED
